channel.title: criticalrole TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from criticalrole

item.title: ARE YOU SUUUUUUUUUUURE? 👀 Game Master @MatthewMercerVO makes extra sure Fearne Calloway (@Smashley Johnson) confirms her spell drop in #CriticalRole Campaign 3, Episode 94 "Where The Red Fearne Glows", available on BEACON and YouTube! 🔔🔥 @Liam O’Brien
